title: Question about World Orbs
body:
Hi!

If I bought World Orbs now and opened them, say, 5 months from now, would I be able to obtain skins that are released within those 5 months and all the bonuses that come with the orbs?

replies.body: Orbs won't expire, however any rafting materials **specific **to an event would no longer be available inside (tickets, materials, etc).  Normal content like shards would still be in it.
Would you suggest purchasing/opening orbs before or after preseason hits? since the BE amount for stuff is changing
